name: Whimsy Woods
description:
The people of Whimsy Woods need some help, those silly little things. Find and help them as you wander in the forest.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Space - Interact

******************

Entry for the STOP WAITING FOR GODOT game jam.

Theme: Keep it simple
